title: Add required INVOICE NUMBER header to GST Excel templates

requirements.summary: Add required "INVOICE NUMBER" to the shared GST template header list so all generated templates include it and uploads validate it as required.
acceptanceCriteria: Downloading each template (A/B/C) produces an .xlsx file whose first row contains an "INVOICE NUMBER" column header.
Uploading an .xlsx missing the "INVOICE NUMBER" header fails validation with a "Missing required columns" error that includes "INVOICE NUMBER".
Uploading an .xlsx that includes the "INVOICE NUMBER" header passes template header validation (all else equal).

file_operations.description: Update the shared GST_INVOICE_HEADERS list to include a new required header string "INVOICE NUMBER" so TEMPLATE_SPECS A/B/C all inherit it for template generation and required-header validation.
